meanings.definition: Having a specified number or kind of sides.
meanings.sent1: The square shape is very sided.
meanings.sent2: The dice is a sided object.
meanings.sent3: The sided cake was cut into perfect squares.
meanings.sent4: Her argument was strong and sided.
meanings.sent5: The sided figure stood out among the shapes.

meanings.definition: Having a specified kind of side or sides.
meanings.sent2: The sided coin had intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The sided bookshelf fit perfectly in the corner.
meanings.sent4: His personality was complex and sided.
meanings.sent5: The sided building had a unique architecture.

meanings.definition: Having a specified number of sides.
meanings.sent1: The triangle is a three sided shape.
meanings.sent3: The sided dice rolled onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: The sided coin spun in the air.
meanings.sent5: The sided figure was easy to count.

meanings.definition: Having a specified kind of side.
meanings.sent1: The sided door opened with a creak.
meanings.sent2: The sided table had intricate carvings.
meanings.sent3: The sided mirror reflected the room.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was warm and sided.
meanings.sent5: The sided wall was painted a bright color.
